fees.description: A $48.60 (GST Incl) fee may apply when your property is reconnected (including when you move). This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary. Please visit your distributor's website to find out the current fee.

electricityContract.terms: For full terms & conditions and solar feed in tariff eligibility, visit our website www.diamondenergy.com.au. For each customer / property you refer during your agreement with us, you receive additional Thrive Discounts of 2% to daily supply and consumption charges for period referrer stays with us. Discounts are additive. Pay on Time conditions also apply. Your friend receives a $35 (incl. GST) sign up credit.

discounts.description: An ongoing discount of 2% to daily supply and consumption charges for customers who agree to receive invoices by email and full payment is made by the due date. The Pay on Time discount may appear as a credit on your next bill.

Ongoing discounts of 2% to daily supply and consumption charges for each customer / property you refer for period referrer stays with us. Discounts are additive. Pay on Time conditions also apply. Your friend receives a $35 (incl. GST) sign up credit.

electricityContract.variation: Electricity charges may be updated on the day that is one month after network tariff price changes. We may vary discounts, solar feed-in rates and other charges from time to time and notify you in accordance with applicable regulations.

eligibility.information: Eligibility and availability criteria apply, including that this offer is only for residential customers who are located within the relevant distribution area with the appropriate network tariff(s) and metering installation and configuration. This offer is also available to customers with eligible solar-PV systems.

greenPowerCharges.description: For 5.5c / kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 100% of your consumption will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators
For 2.75 c / kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 50% of your consumption will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators

solarFeedInTariff.description: Diamond Energy Standard Feed in Tariff

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: This is an ongoing agreement with ongoing benefits and continues until you or we end it.
